QuestionStem: Which of the following would be the best choice to model what drives surface ocean currents?

options.AnswerText: A. a tank of water with a block of ice attached to one end
options.Feedback: Changes in water temperature are not the main driver of surface currents.

options.AnswerText: B. a tank of water with a fan blowing over the surface of the water
C. a system of pipes with a heater at one end
options.Feedback: A tank is a better model of the ocean than a system of pipes.

options.AnswerText: D. a tank of water with a heater under the tank
options.Feedback: Changes in water temperature are not the main driver of surface currents.

FinalIncorrectFeedback: A tank with a fan blowing over the water is the best model because surface winds are the main driver of surface ocean currents.
